about_the_game:
Infinity Pirate is a rogue-lite, time-survival space game with active and minimalistic gameplay.

In the distant future, where a single man ruthlessly monopolized resources, the world suffered under the oppressive rule of Mr. Everything. His insatiable hunger for power drove him to amass an army of evil robots and drones, which he deployed to crush and enslave all life forms. Desperation and despair consumed the hearts of the oppressed until whispers of resistance were heard among the masses.

Legends spoke of a lone figure, shrouded in mystery, who dared to challenge Mr. Everything's reign of terror. This enigmatic savior was said to reside in the depths of space, on the outer rim of the Milky Way—a starship pilot with unparalleled skills capable of outmaneuvering even the most advanced AI battle drones.

They call this pilot the Infinity Pirate.

Shoot down incoming missiles to survive. Infinity Pirate is a futuristic dystopian space opera where a lone hero fights for freedom from a post-late-stage space-capitalism overlord. Your choices will determine whether you will survive the onslaught or be destroyed, losing humanity's best hope for freedom.

Choose from pirate-theme weapon sets: Blunderbuss, Cutlass, Knippleshot, Granado, and more. Non-combat upgrades will also help you survive the robopocolypse.

Test your skill against an endless robot armada. Then, upgrade your starship and become and become the legend that the people of the galaxy need.
